sentences.english: Practice frequently, it can strengthen your Kungfu.
The art of chromatic stone carving belongs to the domain of realistic creation. Thus it demands great effort.
sentences.chinese: 彩石雕刻藝術屬於寫實創作範疇，所以很喫功力。

sentences.english: The picture has a style of the imperial-court decorative painting.
sentences.chinese: 整幅畫繪製工細，功力深厚，有院體風格。

sentences.english: He believes that the skill arrived natural success will come.
sentences.chinese: 他相信功力到了自然水到渠成。

sentences.english: He performed severe penance for many years to gain enough power to become the king of the three worlds.
sentences.chinese: 他苦行多年，獲得了足夠的功力而成爲了三界的國王。

sentences.english: Practise martial arts person has to need to have skill , then it is possible let self move style have antipersonnel force.
sentences.chinese: 習武者必須要具備功力才能使自己的招式有殺傷力。

sentences.english: Zheng Baosheng complained that the atmosphere there was not suitable for him to perform properly.
sentences.chinese: 張寶勝推說是現場氣氛不好，影響功力發揮。

sentences.english: His defensive prowess very well could be the single-most dominant factor for the team.
sentences.chinese: 他防守功力毋庸置疑，這是球隊最主要的優勢。

sentences.english: The new album will fully present Fong's guitar-playing skill.
sentences.chinese: 新專輯裏，大同的吉他功力將會表現得淋漓盡致。

definition: training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
skills acquired through religious practice/(fig.) ability/skill/Taiwan pr. [dao4 hang5]
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
Wugong County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi
martial art/military accomplishments/(Peking opera) martial arts feats
level of mastery (of a skill or area of knowledge)/(archaic) to pay a visit to sb
